formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Name:
formElement.documentation: What would you like to name your new destination?

formElement.label: JNDI name:
formElement.documentation: What JNDI Name would you like to use to look up your new distributed topic?

formElement.label: Destination Type:
formElement.documentation: Queue members may be either created uniformly from a common configuration, or created and weighted individually to fine tune performance. How would you like to create queue members?

formElement.label: Forwarding Policy:
formElement.documentation: The Forwarding Policy for a topic defines how messages are forwarded to members. What forwarding policy would you like to use for this new destination?

formElement.label: Template:
formElement.documentation: Templates provide an efficient means of defining multiple destinations with similar configuration values. Would you like to use a template for this destination?

formElement.label: Server Name:
formElement.documentation: Server name is required if you're not sure that JMS Module exists. If it does not - procedure will create JMS module and add Server as target to it.
